Litigate.definition: to seek resolution of a legal contest by judicial process [chose to rather than settle] vt
Litigate.origin: [Latin litigatus , past participle of litigare , from lit- , lis lawsuit + agere to drive]

-gatÂ·ing.definition: [Latin, past participle of, from,lawsuit +to drive]to seek resolution of a legal contest by judicial process [chose to rather than settle]to make the subject of a suit [ a claim]to contest or resolve in court [ an insanity defense]
